messages.title: Here's three good reasons to back James

keyPolicies.policyDescription: James campaigned tirelessly to keep Britain in the EU. He believes people in Canterbury deserve a say on the final terms of the Brexit deal.
James will be a champion for local health and social care services. Promises to fight against NHS being under threat from Conservative cuts and to fight for hospital funding.
Plans to invest nearly £7b, reverse cuts to frontline school and college budgets, protect per pupil funding in real terms and ensure no school loses out from the National Funding Formula.

mentions.candidate: James Flanagan is the best choice as our next MP.

issues.brexitEurope: James campaigned tirelessly to keep Britain in the EU.
issues.education: Plans to invest nearly £7b in schools and colleges.
issues.health: James will champion local health and social care services, fight NHS cuts.

quotes.text: Local campaigner James Flanagan is the best choice as the new MP for Canterbury.
